title: Designing Customized Science Teaching Methods for Learners with Multicultural Backgrounds

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Science Major Courses for Multicultural Background Students: Customized Strategies Considering Cultural Characteristics and Gender/Age Differences

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of multicultural learners' cultural backgrounds on learning approaches and incorporate findings into instructional design.

Learners identify at least three differences between deep/shallow learning types in science subjects (physics, chemistry, biology, etc.) and design two or more customized teaching strategies per type. They achieve over 80% suitability scores in peer and expert reviews.

By analyzing survey results on learning tendencies by gender (male/female) and age group (20-24/25-29), learners create lesson plans combining three collaborative learning strategies and two competitive learning strategies. They achieve over 80% suitability in peer and expert reviews.
Build a system for analyzing individual learning patterns using formative assessment data in an LMS environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
